TextView.android:text: Then while the assistant holds the collar at the right tie string with the left hand, the wearer inserts the right arm into the sleeve. While awaiting the assistant to tie and adjust the gown, the wearer keeps both arms extended upward. When tying the gown, the assistant stands directly behind the gown wearer, places his/her hands only on the shoulders and inside of the gown and does not touch the sides or front of the gown. The surgical gown is considered sterile in the front chest area and from the wrist to the elbow.
